short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize any text with just a click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gemini's Prompt API and Summarizer API for a quick and easy way to summarize highlighted text! Visit our Webpage to see installation instructions! This is an Open Source project, and we welcome all contributors!

https://snelso24.github.io/HackersProject03/index.html
